SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Angles
The Angles class represents a global goal called "Angles" of the game.
Client
The Client interface represents a client in a network communication.
ClientImplementation
The ClientImplementation class is an implementation of the Client interface.
ClientSkeleton
The client skeleton class represents a client's connection to the server.
ColumnOutOfBoundsException
The ColumnOutOfBoundsException is an exception that is thrown when a column index is out of bounds.
ColumnsOrRows
The ColumnsOrRows class represents the global goals related to Columns and Rows of the game.
Config
The Config class is responsible for loading and providing configuration data for the game.
Config.BoardGoalScore
Represents the score for a board goal.
Config.GlobalGoalScore
Represents the score for a GlobalGoal token.
Config.PrivateGoalScore
Represents the score for a private goal.
ConsoleColors
The ConsoleColors enum provides ANSI escape codes for coloring console output.
Controller
The Controller class handles the game logic and manages player actions.
Coordinates
Represents the coordinates of a position on a GameBoard.
DisconnectMessage
The DisconnectMessage class represents a message indicating that a player has disconnected from the game.
EightTiles
The EightTiles class represents a global goal called "Eight Tiles" of the game.
EmptySackException
The EmptySackException is an exception that is thrown when trying to access an empty tile sack.
Game
The Game class represents a game session of MyShelfie.
GameBoard
The GameBoard class represents the game board in the game.
GameBoardView
The GameBoardView class represents the immutable version of the GameBoard.
GameListener
The GameListener interface represents a listener for game updates.
GameServer
The GameServer class represents the server component responsible for managing the game lobby and the game itself.
GameServerMessage
The GameServerMessage class represents a message telling the Client that the server it should communicate with has changed.
GameServerMessageTicket
The GameServerMessageTicket class represents an empty message to let a GameServerMessage information go through the network.
GameView
The GameView class represents the immutable version of the Game.
GlobalGoal
The GlobalGoal class represents a global goal of the game.
GlobalGoalView
The GlobalGoalView class represents the immutable version of the GlobalGoal.
GraphicalUI
Class representing the GUI, thus a UserInterface implementing the View.
GroupOfTiles
The GroupOfTiles class represents a global goal that requires creating a certain number of groups of tiles on the shelf.
IllegalColumnInsertionException
The IllegalColumnInsertionException is an exception that is thrown when trying to insert a tile into an illegal column on a game board.
InvalidCoordinatesForCurrentGameException
The InvalidCoordinatesForCurrentGameException is an exception that is thrown when invalid coordinates are provided for the current game state.
InvalidIndexException
The InvalidIndexException is an exception that is thrown when an invalid index is encountered.
InvalidIPAddress
Custom exception class to handle invalid IP address errors.
InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
The InvalidNumberOfPlayersException is an exception that is thrown when an invalid number of players is encountered.
InvalidNumOfPlayersMessage
The InvalidNumOfPlayersMessage class represents a message indicating an invalid number of players.
InvalidPort
Custom exception class to handle invalid IP Port errors.
InvalidScoreException
The InvalidScoreException is an exception that is thrown when an invalid score is encountered.
IPAddressValidator
The IPAddressValidator class provides methods to validate IP addresses, ports and URLs.
LobbyMessage
The LobbyMessage class represents a message containing the list of players in the lobby.
Message
The Message interface is an abstract class that represents a generic message.
MissingShelfException
The MissingShelfException is an exception that is thrown when a required shelf is missing.
MissingUsernameMessage
The MissingUsernameMessage class represents a message indicating that the username is missing or null.
NoLobbyAvailableMessage
The NoLobbyAvailableMessage class represents a message indicating that no lobby is available.
NoTileException
The NoTileException is an exception that is thrown when a tile is not found.
NullPlayersException
The NullPlayersException is an exception that is thrown when an players is null during the game.
PingMessage
Represents a ping message sent to test the connection with a player.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the game.
PlayerView
The PlayerView class represents the immutable version of the Player.
PrivateGoal
The PrivateGoal class represents a private goal card in the game.
PrivateGoalView
The PrivateGoalView class represents the immutable version of the PrivateGoal.
ReconnectMessage
The ReconnectMessage class represents a message indicating a player's intention to reconnect.
RegisterMessage
The RegisterMessage class represents a message for registering a player.
Server
The Server interface represents the server in the network communication.
ServerImplementation
The ServerImplementation class represents the server implementation for the game.
ServerStub
The ServerStub class represents a client-side stub for the server.
Shape
The Shape class represents a global goal that requires matching a specific shape of tiles on the shelf.
Shelf
The Shelf class represents a shelf in the game where tiles can be placed.
ShelfView
The ShelfView class represents the immutable version of the Shelf.
SingletonException
Custom exception class to represent exceptions related to singleton classes.
Square
The Square class represents a global goal that requires having two separated groups of tiles of the same color on the shelf.
Stair
The Stair class represents a global goal that requires having five columns with ascending or descending heights on the shelf.
TakenUsernameMessage
The TakenUsernameMessage class represents a message indicating that a username is already taken.
TextualUI
Class representing the TUI, thus a UserInterface implementing the View.
Tile
The Tile class represents a tile in the game.
TileColor
The TileColor enum represents the different colors of tiles in the game.
TileSack
The TileSack class represents a sack of tiles in the game.
TileView
The TileView class represents the immutable version of the Tile.
Tuple<T1,T2>
This class is used to create a tuple of two elements.
TurnActionMessage
The TurnActionMessage class represents a message containing the details of a turn action.
UpdateViewMessage
The UpdateViewMessage class represents a message containing an updated game view.
UserInterface
The UserInterface class is an abstract class responsible for managing the client-side functionality.
UsernameNotFoundException
The UsernameNotFoundException is an exception that is thrown when a username is not found.
UsernameNotFoundMessage
The UsernameNotFoundMessage class represents a message indicating that there is no username to reconnect.
View
The View interface represents the view component of the client application.
ViewListener
The ViewListener interface represents a listener for view messages.
